name: Level III lymph nodes
definition:
Lymph nodes located around the middle third of the internal jugular vein, extending from the carotid bifurcation superior to the omohyoid muscle (surgical landmark) or cricothyroid notch (clinical landmark) inferiorly. The posterior boundary is the posterior border of the sternocleidomastoid muscle, and the anterior boundary is the lateral border of the sternohyoid muscle. 

Includes the following lymph nodes:
Middle deep cervical lymph node
